entry.lex: Ayam penyet is a Javanese dish made nationwide, and can also be found in Malaysia and Singapore. It should be served hot and contains the main ingredients of squeezed or smashed fried chicken served with sambal.
Ayam penyet is a hot food dish found in Java, Malaysia and Singapore and consists of fried chicken and sambal sauce.
